speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, thank you. How can I help you?

speaker: Agent
text: I need to verify your identity first. Can you provide your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thanks for that. Now, what's your current address?

speaker: Customer
text: I live at 123 Main Street, Springfield.

speaker: Agent
text: Alright, you have an outstanding balance of $500. How do you plan to settle this?

speaker: Customer
text: I would like to discuss payment options first.

speaker: Agent
text: Listen, you can't just ignore this! You think this will just vanish? Pay up!

speaker: Customer
text: I understand this is important, and I'm here to help find a solution.

speaker: Agent
text: Well, you better get your shit together and stop dodging this. It's pathetic!

speaker: Customer
text: I assure you I'm not dodging anything. I'm simply looking for clarity.

speaker: Agent
text: Clarity? You want clarity? You owe money! Just pay it already!

speaker: Customer
text: I appreciate your urgency, but I would like to keep this conversation professional.

speaker: Agent
text: Professional? You think I give a damn about being professional with a deadbeat like you?
